statement: Replace brian_mingus_resume.json with michael_scott_resume.json and update default asset references.
Seed full Michael Scott + David Brent resume data to exercise the resume builder (profile, skills, experience, education, founder roles, custom sections) using ASCII-only content.
Ensure asset imports via CLI are safe for real users (no overwrite without explicit override) and document the import workflow.
Keep dev/test runs isolated from user data (ephemeral or stub DB for test flows).
Run python harness.py --run-all-tests and record results for the new resume asset changes.
Compile the Michael Scott resume PDF using a stubbed DB and perform a vision review of the rendered output.
Ensure long resume names render on a single line in Typst by adjusting header layout and layering.
